Message.EnterTheFollowinglink: Enter the following secure link to verify.
Message.AnErrorOccurred: An error occurred, please try again.
Message.InvalidEmailOrTries: Email is not invited or limit of tries exceeded.
Message.EnablePermissions: Go to settings to enable permissions.
Message.SelectAnotherDocument: Do you have a another identity document?
Message.WouldAnotherDocument:
Would you like to try again with 
another identity document?

OnBoardingError.message: Provided document seems to be non authentic.
Provided image does not seem to be a valid document's picture.
Document data could not be retrieved. It seems that your document picture is not valid.
Some required fields could not be retrieved from OCR reading.
Sorry, the identity document used is not permitted, please use other identity document to verify your identity.
Sorry, the identity document used is not permitted, please use other identity document to verify your identity.
Owner's age specified in document is not in allowed range.
Sorry, the identity document used is not permitted, please use other identity document to verify your identity.
Required portrait image could not be retrieved from OCR reading.
Owner's age specified in document is not in selfies estimated age range.
Document's gender field does not match with selfie estimated gender.
Self-portraits do not fulfill minimum requirements or do not match to each other.
An unexpected error occured during this process execution.
One of the required document pictures is missing.
Some required fields could not be retrieved from OCR reading.
Provided document's type seems to be different from selected type.
Some data could not be read correctly or no data could be retrieved at all.
Sorry, your document has expired.
One or both pictures of your document got a score less than configured threshold.
No document could be detected in one or both of your provided pictures.
An unexpected error has been raised during document detection process.

IntegrationButton.Title:
This is the beginning
of the identity verification
IntegrationButton.SubTitle:
The button below will start the
process, you will integrate this
button with your App.

Setting.Title: Configuration
Setting.LogoParameters: Upload your logo with max 500KB size and 180x40px as .png or .jpg
Setting.Heading: Heading

Invite.Title:
Welcome to
Preventor ID
Invite.SubTitle:
Enter your email invitation
on the input below.

LetsGetYouVerified.Title: Let's get you verified

Option1.Label: OPTION 1
Option1.Title: Scan the QR code
Option1.Description: Scan the QR code with your camera app.

Option2.Label: OPTION 2
Option2.Title: Send link via SMS
Option2.Description: We’ll text a secure link to your mobile at no extra cost.

PrepareDocument.Title: Prepare a valid document
PrepareDocument.Description: Make sure it’s not expired or physically damaged.

UseSmartphone.Title: Use a smartphone
UseSmartphone.Description: You need a smartphone in order to continue.

LetsGetYouVerified.PrivacyPolicy: Read more about your personal data processing in Preventor’s privacy policy.

SecureLinkSent.Title: Check your mobile
SecureLinkSent.SubTitle: We’ve sent a secure link to
SecureLinkSent.SubTitle2: It may take a few minutes to arrive.

Start.Title: Start your identity verification
Start.SubTitle:
We'll walk you through a seamless 
process to verify your identity

PrepareSteps.Title:
Prepare for
identity verification

Steps.Step1: Prepare your government-issued ID to be scanned.
Steps.Step2: Position yourself in good light for a selfie.
Steps.Step3: Have your email address ready to be verified.
Steps.Step4: Have your mobile phone ready to be verified.

PrepareSteps.Agreements: By clicking continue you agree with the terms of service and our privacy policy.

ChooseCountry.Title:
From which country 
is your document?
ChooseCountry.SubTitle: Please select the country from the dropdown list.

ChooseDocument.Title: Choose the type of document
ChooseDocument.SubTitle: Please select the type of identity document from the dropdown list.

GlobalDocument.Title: Get ready to scan your

Instructions.Step1: Place the document on a dark, flat surface in excellent lighting.

Passport.Title: Get ready to scan your passport
Passport.SubTitle: Open the page showing your personal information and continue on the next screen.

DriverLicense.Title: Get ready to scan your driver license
DriverLicense.SubTitle: Prepare your driver license to take a picture of the front and back and continue on the next screen.

IdCard.Title: Get ready to scan your national ID card
IdCard.SubTitle: Prepare your ID card to take a picture of the front and back and continue on the next screen.

ResidentPermitCard.Title: Get ready to scan your resident permit card
ResidentPermitCard.SubTitle: Prepare your resident permit card to take a picture of the front and back and continue on the next screen.

Visa.Title: Get ready to scan your visa
Visa.SubTitle: Open the page showing your personal information and continue on the next screen.

Global.Title: Get ready to scan your identity document
Global.SubTitle: Prepare your identity document to take a picture of the front or back and continue on the next screen.

GlobalDocument.SubTitle2: Please ensure all data is readable and avoid reflections.

PrepareSelfie.Title: Get ready for your selfie
PrepareSelfie.SubTitle: Position yourself in good lighting and follow instructions on the next screen.

Instructions.Step2: Use a neutral expression, no smiling and have your eyes open.
Instructions.Step3: Make sure your face is centered within the two circles.

PrepareRfid.Title: Ready to scan
PrepareRfid.SubTitle:
To complete your verification, we also need to scan the electronic chip 
from your document.
PrepareRfid.SubTitle2:
Prepare to hold your phone near your ID 
to scan the electronic chip.

Outside.Title: Match circles
Outside.SubTitle: Face not detected, position your face inside the circle

Far.Title: Match circles
Far.SubTitle: Move closer until circles are green

CameraDocument.Title:
Avoid glare and shadow.
Use a flat surface in good lighting.

FailedAttempts.Title:
Your identity verification
has been submitted
FailedAttempts.SubTitle:
We’ll review your information and we’ll 
get back to you as soon as possible.

ExceededAttempts.Title:
We coudn’t confirm 
your identify
ExceededAttempts.SubTitle:
You've exceeded the maximum limit of attempts to verify your identify

Let’s try that again, but first, please:

Instructions.Step1: Position yourself in good lighting with a neutral expression, no smiling.
Instructions.Step2: Place the document on a dark, flat surface in excellent lighting.
Instructions.Step3: Prepare to select the type of ID and to take a picture.

TryAgainRfid.Title: Let’s try that again
TryAgainRfid.SubTitle: But first, please make sure of the following:

Instructions.Step1: Hold your phone near your ID to scan the electronic chip.

TryAgainDocument.Title: Let’s try that again
TryAgainDocument.Title2:
We coudn’t complete 
your identify verification
TryAgainDocument.SubTitle: But first, please make sure of the following:

Instructions.Step1: Place the document on a dark, flat surface in excellent lighting.

TryAgainDocumentNative.Title: Let’s try that again
TryAgainDocumentNative.SubTitle: But first, please make sure of the following:

Instructions.Step1: Allow camera access to scan your identity document.
Instructions.Step2: Place the document on a dark, flat surface in a excellent lighting.
Instructions.Step3: Position your smartphone camera directly over the document (no angle). Avoid glare and shadow.

TryAgainSelfie.Title: Let’s try that again
TryAgainSelfie.SubTitle: But first, please make sure of the following:

Instructions.Step2: Use a neutral expression, no smiling and have your eyes open.
Instructions.Step3: Make sure your face is centered within the two circles.

TimeOut.Title: Are you still there?
TimeOut.SubTitle: If not, we'll close this session in:

Email.Title: What is your email address?
Email.SubTitle: We'll send a verification code to this email.

EmailVerification.Title: Verify your email address
EmailVerification.SubTitle: We’ve sent a verification code to

Phone.Title: What is your mobile phone number?
Phone.SubTitle: We'll send a verification code to this number.

PhoneVerification.Title: Verify your mobile phone number
PhoneVerification.SubTitle: We’ve sent a verification code to

IdentityVerificationSubmitted.Title:
Your identity verification
has been submitted
IdentityVerificationSubmitted.SubTitle: We’ll review your information and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

StreamLineSubmitted.Title: Your digital onboarding has been submitted
StreamLineSubmitted.SubTitle: We’ll review your information and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

SubTitle.IdentityVerification: Your identity verification has been completed.
SubTitle.Streamline: Your streamline digital onboarding has been completed.

DeniedAccessCamera.Title: You have denied access to your camera.
DeniedAccessCamera.SubTitleMicroFrontEnd:
In order to continue,
please enable access to your camera in your browser settings.
DeniedAccessCamera.SubTitleMobile: In order to continue, please enable access to your camera in your phone settings.

DeniedDeviceId.Title: You have denied access to your device id.
DeniedDeviceId.SubTitleMobile: In order to continue, please enable access to your device id in your phone settings.

CancelVerification.Title: Cancel verification
CancelVerification.SubTitle:
This may impact your ability to access the service.

Are you sure to continue?
